name: Emerald XS
description: Emerald is one of those crystals that has been valued since ancient times. This member of the beryl family has secured its place among the Big Four gems along with diamond, ruby ​​and sapphire. Its green colour reflects the beauty of nature by reminding us of green forests, meadows, and an abundance of leaves on trees and shrubs. Emerald has many metaphysical properties. By making a solid connection with the heart chakra, it will most affect your emotions. Destroying all negativity will encourage you to look at life more positively and enjoy the pleasures it provides. The crystal is known by all as the stone of successful love and signifies loyalty and honesty. It promotes greater mutual understanding, forgiveness and will help you accept each other in your relationship. The mineral will teach you patience and compassion, which will always help you move forward even when it is challenging to do so. Suppose your heart is pounding with sorrow and dissatisfaction with expectations. In that case, an emerald will help you break free from these feelings, thus helping the energy of love flow freely, bringing satisfaction to your relationship. From time immemorial, members of the royal family and emperors have adorned themselves with emeralds. Therefore, no matter how you look at it, this crystal symbolizes luxury and financial well-being. It brings prosperity, success, happiness and honour. The healing properties of emeralds can help regulate intraocular pressure and treat digestive problems. It is said to help with Parkinson's disease, depression and paranoia. Emerald energy can also protect the heart, regulate blood pressure, reduce inflammation, and prevent infections.

name: Opal glass – 925 silver
description: Opalite is often mixed with Opal. The essential difference of this stone is that it is not formed by the earth but by the man-made synthetic glass. It is also mentioned in written sources as the Tiffani Stone. The two primary colours of Opalite, blue and white, create a unique opalescent shine. Although not naturally created, this stone has properties that can bring many changes to your life. It radiates an energy of pure, childish joy that will remind you that the best time to enjoy life is now, without waiting for anything. The stone will lift your mood, encourage you to stay young at heart, look for the bright side of life and let even the simplest joys of life enter your heart.

name: Milky opal
description: Opal is a hydrated silica mineral. In Sanskrit, the name Upala means gemstone. These minerals come in various shades (red, blue, green, white, black, and others) caused by the addition of iron, chromium, manganese, and other heavy metals. White opals, also called milky opals, are most commonly found in nature. They are characterised by opalescence, which gives a mystical spectrum of colours. Due to this property, white opals are most often used to produce luxury jewellery (rings, piercings). Having milk opal, you will invite your angels to be by your side and guard you. It gives hope, optimism and the desire to live and increases joy. It also cleanses and balances the chakras, ensuring that their energies merge with the body.

name: Rose opal
description: The beautiful Opal, translated from Sanskrit, means precious stone, or in Greek - a visible change of colour, is shrouded in various legends. Indian mythology says that the Virgin Rainbow goddess was turned into this crystal to maintain her purity. Greek written sources, meanwhile, say that their predecessors believed that the miracle stone gives the gift of prophecy and protects against disease. For more than a decade, there have been believers that Opal brings failure and avoids carrying it with them or giving it to others. However, this naturally created miracle returned to the market as a valued mineral without proving this trait.

name: Opal – Palmstone
description: The Opal palmstone is a beautiful crystal that can be used for meditation and stress relief. Its smooth, organic design provides users with a calming energy and encourages mental clarity. Opal is known for its healing properties, making it an excellent choice for anyone looking for a natural way to ease stress and anxiety. The crystal gives an emotional balance. Therefore, some naturalistic psychologists and psychiatrists evaluate dendritic opal as believing that it can cure depression or help overcome complex emotions and mental problems. Besides, the crystal treats specific ailments such as dizziness, circulatory disorders, insulin deficiency, inflammatory disorders and others.

name: Dendritic opal Raw
description: Dendritic opal attracts the eye with its milky white colour, and it contains fern, moss, or tree-like patterned inclusions of metallic oxides like manganese and iron.  The patterns in the stone are never the same, just like snowflakes. These opal fillers are often formed at relatively low temperatures and have a resinous lustre. Although the crystal is found all over the world, its largest sources are in Australia. Dendritic opal was discovered here in the 19th century and quickly became a favourite of the royal family. The wearer of the stone becomes more open, more articulate and at the same time a strong-minded person. The water and plant patterns in the crystal are thought to symbolize life and harmony. It is the key created by nature to self-awareness and clarity of mind.

name: Flint stone
description: Flint is a sedimentary mineral and a cryptocrystalline form of quartz. Traces of this stone intertwine directly with human evolution. Flint carving and construction tools, weapons were found and dated millions of years ago. It is a worldwide mineral that can be found in beaches, rivers and lakes. Its colour is usually grey but can also be black, brown, red, pink, blue, green, white, and light yellow. Flint will help your physical and emotional bodies unite into one common whole that will work in your favour. It has powerful grounding energies. In turn, the stone will help its wearer become bolder, stronger and more proactive. It is said to move lazy people to action. By wearing flint on your neck, the stone will help you defend your opinion firmly, convincing others that you are right. The stone gives a gift of eloquence, clarifies the mind, and makes decisions quickly and correctly.

name: Flint pendant – Donut 30mm
description: Flint provides emotional stability. It is a suitable stone for people suffering from jealousy or anger. Strengthening your intuition will help you recognize your emerging negative emotions and avoid conflict situations. It is said that carrying flint in the pocket will encourage one's generosity and compassion for others. The stone is believed to protect the house from lightning. It also absorbs and destroys all the negative energy that enters the living environment. In ancient times, travellers carried a pebble with them, believing that it would protect them from the dangers lurking along the way.

name: Flint XL
description: Flint is a sedimentary mineral and a cryptocrystalline form of quartz. Traces of this stone intertwine directly with human evolution. Flint carving and construction tools, weapons were found and dated millions of years ago. It is a worldwide mineral that can be found in beaches, rivers and lakes. Its colour is usually grey but can also be black, brown, red, pink, blue, green, white, and light yellow. In folk medicine, flint is used to clean kidney stones. It also helps those with liver and digestive problems. In some regions, flint infusions are used as antiseptics. It is believed that it can help women and girls maintain their skin's beauty by clearing it of acne.

name: Apatite – Raw
description:
Apatite appears in various colours, such as yellow (gold), blue, green, grey, and brown. The most influential colours for metaphysical use are blue, green, and gold. Greeks were the first to recognize this mineral's chameleon-like qualities and its ability to resemble other crystals such as Peridot. That's why they started to call it by name meaning 'to deceive.'
Apatite is the mineral that will illuminate your mind with clarity and help you better understand yourself. Under its guidance, you will be entirely able to balance your dreams and responsibilities in life, which often stops us from our desires and being ourselves. That is the basis of true happiness and the belief that anything is possible.
Most people have harmful thought patterns, such as judging daily life's demands or negative thoughts about ourself and others, feeling neurotic and confused about everything that happens in your life. All these are the roadblocks holding back from your true potential. To keep these thoughts from mucking up your aura, gaze at the stone, a practice that borrows from the Zen tradition and encourages peaceful contemplation.
This crystal is like hot chocolate for the soul. It will warm up and activate your chakras. Place a stone over the chest (thymus chakra), and you'll feel unconditional love (free from ego), compassion and forgiveness. If you're willing to travel the other side of the dimension and see the undiscovered possibilities of your soul, place the mineral over the third-eye chakra and get ready for the marvellous journey in your life.

name: Apatite XXL
description: Apatite XXL is the perfect crystal for the collector or enthusiast. This crystal features an extra-large size, perfect for those looking for an eye-catching display piece. Apatite is known for its vibrant hue and its wide range of color possibilities. It is a great addition to any collection and a statement piece.

name: Aquamarine A+ quality
description:
Aquamarine is also called the stone of the water. Its light blue-green shades remind of the sea. That is why gems name come from the Latin word for seawater. Many legends say that Aquamarine is the treasure of the mermaids. It’s hard to denied it because the beautiful crystal is so charming that you can compare it to the diamond.
The gem has a strong connection with the throat, heart and third eye chakras. As a result, it will open the intuitive mind, bringing higher frequency information, enhance spiritual connection and clear your communication blocks. You will be able to express yourself better. If you work with this stone, it will lead you on a path where you will not judge others and develop greater tolerance. Besides, you will realize your innermost truth. With stones help you refuse old patterns of behaviour that no longer serve and inhibit the new ones' development.
Like the waving sea, Aquamarine has a calming effect. Its soothing energies reduce stress and unwind the mind. Use this stone during your meditation as it will deepen meditative states. You will observe harmony and joy.

name: Aventurine pendant – Donut
description:
Aventurine is of quartz origin. Therefore, it has a shiny effect and transparency. The crystals name comes from an Italian word a ventura meaning 'by chance.' The most popular is green Aventurine, but it can also be orange, brown, yellow, blue, or grey.
If you feel that your life is leading you down, success has abandoned you; this crystal is for you. Aventurine will attract prosperity, abundance and success. It is also beneficial to carry a piece of crystal in your wallet - for financial well-being.
The crystal will also surround you with calming and loving energy that will give you emotional balance. It is mostly useful for people who have difficulty managing anxiety, anger and overcoming various emotional traumas. It will inspire you with hope, joy, optimism, excitement, creativity, and a positive outlook on your existence and destiny with its healing properties. When you look at life from a bright side, you will feel more confident, and it will be easier for you to overcome the challenges that arise. You will feel how positive change is coming towards you.
Aventurine is also good for your physical body. It has a significantly positive effect on the nervous system, calming it and overcoming many illnesses associated with anxiety and stress. It also improves heart and lung function. Helps people who have fertility problems. Crystal accelerates healing after various operations. Besides, people believe Aventurine to help with various skin problems such as acne or eczema.
As you meditate with this crystal, ask him to bring you success in various aspects of life. If you are manifesting to give your desires physical shape, it is beneficial to have pure quartz nearby. Or keep it under a pillow. Even so, the crystal will bring positive change to your life. It is also very helpful to keep this Aventurine next to your computer or phone, protect you from harmful rays.
